scripts.test:ci: npm run typecheck && npm run format:check && npm run test:all -- --fail-only && node test/lib/ensure-full-coverage.js
scripts.esm:
(cat src/idiomorph.js && echo "
export {Idiomorph};") > dist/idiomorph.esm.js && (echo "import htmx from \"htmx.org\";
" && cat dist/idiomorph-ext.js && echo "
export {Idiomorph};") > dist/idiomorph-ext.esm.js
scripts.gen-modules: npm run-script amd && npm run-script cjs && npm run-script esm
scripts.dist: cp -r src/* dist/ && cat src/idiomorph.js src/idiomorph-htmx.js > dist/idiomorph-ext.js && npm run-script gen-modules && npm run-script uglify && gzip -9 -k -f dist/idiomorph.min.js > dist/idiomorph.min.js.gz && exit
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs -m eval -o dist/idiomorph.min.js dist/idiomorph.js && uglifyjs -m eval -o dist/idiomorph-ext.min.js dist/idiomorph-ext.js
